column4: hey... im trying to get my wificard working on my laptop.. when i go to System - network drivers, i see the driver installed, but not activated. how do i activate it? and when i write lspci in a terminal, i see my network card
oh, there is no activate. What card is it?
its working once in a while.. its really strange.. im having problems with it..
i cant pastebin.. the laptop is not connected to the internet. but the lspci is showing the network card under "network controllers"
I need the network card number.
ill get it for you.. ill look at the laptop.. one moment
what drivers do you see listed under hardware drivers?
its the "Broadcom STA wireless driver" and it says "activated but currently not in use"
what does the bottom-right button read?
thanks.. ill take a look at it :)
I suggest you try removing it and reinstalling.
thanks.. ill try.. ill log of now, and get back later.. thanks for the help
